alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Elmore; Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 8:41AM CST until February 06 at 10:36PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River At Montgomery affecting Lowndes, Montgomery, Elmore, Dallas and Autauga Counties. .Heavy rainfall over the past 24 hours is resulting in water rises along the Alabama River. Another statement will be issued by this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River At Montgomery. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Extensive flooding of low lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 28.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 37.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
